author: nc1234
content: <@654267572107083777> What client code does Nimbus EL return for `engine_getClientVersionV1`? A quick search looks like both Nimbus and Nimbus EL go by `NB` which is a little confusing but I guess it works. Would probably be clearer if Nimbus EL returns another code something like `NE` and update this list https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/identification.md#clientcode what do you think?
